report design

Description:
Exception is thrown out when preview the attached report design.
Regression of #189336

Build number: 
2.2.1.v200708014-0630

Steps to reproduce:
1. Preview the attached report design.

Expected result:
No exception is thrown out.

Actual result:
Exception is thrown out.

Error log:
- Retrieving binding data error

the report is created using a none released BIRT, the binding type is in-correct. The user should change the type of year, month to int.

The latest BIRT won't generate such a problem.

traces.message: Can not convert the value of 1 to Date type.
